summary: BLOCK 59.2 Decision Kernel testing completed successfully. All core backend API endpoints for P1.1 (Consensus Index), P1.2 (Conflict Policy), and P1.3 (Sizing Policy) are functioning correctly. Frontend pages load properly but some admin API endpoints are experiencing 520 connectivity errors.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 520 error instead of admin dashboard data
critical_bugs.impact: Admin dashboard cannot load governance, health, and reliability cards

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 520 errors for overlay data, fractal overlay shows 'No overlay data'

integration_issues.issue: System Health and Reliability cards not displaying due to API 520 errors

passed_tests: P1.1: Consensus Index structure with score, dir, dispersion, multiplier, weights, votes
P1.2: Conflict Policy structure with level, mode, sizingPenalty, structureVsTiming, tiers
P1.3: Sizing Policy structure with mode, preset, multipliers, finalSize, sizeLabel
Decision Kernel value consistency (consensus score vs dispersion, sizing calculations)
Frontend Fractal Research Terminal page loads with chart
Chart mode switcher working (Price Chart ⟷ Fractal Overlay)
Forward Performance panel present and functional
Admin page /admin/fractal loads with navigation tabs
Admin dashboard tab switching (Overview ⟷ Shadow Divergence)
MongoDB connection working via fractal health endpoint

success_percentage.frontend: 80% (UI components work, some API integrations failing)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix HTTP 520 errors on admin API endpoints (/api/fractal/v2.1/admin/overview) and overlay data endpoints. The backend service may be experiencing routing or connectivity issues with specific endpoints while core terminal functionality works correctly.
